input.sentences: okay | hiking really is n't my thing at all . but [male] offered to take me and take care of all my gear so i thought | why not ?
it was a hard trek up through the woods . but all those cardio sessions really paid off .
i hung in there like a trooper and was right behind [male] every time he turned around to snap a picture .
and the view up there was amazing . nothing like what you would see in the city .
sad to say | my favorite part though was getting to the top and setting up camp so i could quit walking !
output.sentences: The man was ready to hike.
He started out on the trail.
He walked farther into the forest.
He made it to the lake.
He set up camp with a friend.
